title: [Sponsor] Rewatch
content:
Collaboration shouldn’t require endless meetings that take away from real work. It’s too tempting for people to “grab some time” off your calendar and create costly interruptions with meetings you could’ve skipped if there were quality notes.

Rewatch fixes this by recording your Zoom, Google Meet, and Teams meetings and generating next-level AI recaps that catch you up in seconds via our web, iOS, and Android apps. Need to continue the conversation? Use our desktop screen recorder for Mac and Windows to share when a “quick sync” or meeting across time zones isn’t ideal.

Get your time back. Try Rewatch for free today.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
